custom_nodes.author: vuhung3990
custom_nodes.title: NSFW Guard
custom_nodes.description: NSFW content detection node for ComfyUI - blocks inappropriate images automatically using YOLOv9 model.

custom_nodes.author: TheMadDoctor007
custom_nodes.title: Qwen Camera Selector
custom_nodes.description: Custom ComfyUI node providing camera angle and cinematic shot selection presets designed for Qwen multi-angle workflows.

custom_nodes.author: zengxianyu
custom_nodes.title: Intensity Fake Depth Node for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: Output Fake Depth Maps with Detailed Object Boundaries

custom_nodes.author: aimoviestudio
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Prompt Builder
custom_nodes.description: Stop wasting hours tweaking prompt. This extension allows you to modularize your prompts into variables and assemble them using a powerful template-based approach.

custom_nodes.author: shmba05tom
custom_nodes.title: Comfyui-Image-Concat
custom_nodes.description: a powerful image concatenation tool for ComfyUI, with True Alpha Channel Support and Multiple Image-block Fill Modes.

custom_nodes.author: jianglinbin
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI 3D Angles Selector
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI custom nodes for multi-angle LoRA prompt generation. Provides 3D visual angle selector and simple angle selector with support for 8 azimuths × 4 elevations × 3 distances = 96 view combinations.

custom_nodes.author: vantagewithai
custom_nodes.title: Vantage-Nodes
custom_nodes.description: This release introduces Vantage Nodes, a powerful utility and infrastructure node pack for ComfyUI, designed for advanced workflows, batch processing, and experimental pipelines.

custom_nodes.author: vantagewithai
custom_nodes.title: Vantage-Step-Audio-EditX
custom_nodes.description: This project is a custom node implementation built on top of Step-Audio-EditX. It adapts and extends EditX capabilities to support multi‑speaker, long‑format, voice cloning, and emotion/style/speed editing, enabling you to feed in a script with multiple speakers, inline pauses, paralinguistic cues, and get a concatenated audio output in one pass.

custom_nodes.author: zengxianyu
custom_nodes.title: Phase-Preserving Noise
custom_nodes.description: Generate phase-preserving structured noise for the input image.

custom_nodes.author: 3R3BOS
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-3R3BOS-Pack
custom_nodes.description: Control and visualization toolkit (Gatekeeper, Slider) and more in the future.

custom_nodes.author: JasonHoku
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Ultimate Auto Sampler Config Grid Testing Suite
custom_nodes.description: A professional-grade benchmarking and IDE-like testing suite. Features Cartesian product grid generation, interactive dashboard, and 'Revise & Generate' workflow.

custom_nodes.author: jchiotaka
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-tile-calculator
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI custom node for calculating tile dimensions in upscaling workflows

custom_nodes.author: danielvw
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-WanMove-Adapter
custom_nodes.description: This custom node allows you to convert trajectories from JSON files directly into WanMove TRACKS.

custom_nodes.author: Anzhc
custom_nodes.title: SDXL-Flux2VAE-ComfyUI-Node
custom_nodes.description: Simple node to patch ComfyUI generation with the SDXL Flux2VAE arch support.

custom_nodes.author: KrakenUnbound
custom_nodes.title: Kraken Tools
custom_nodes.description: 15 productivity nodes: Kraken Unbound Prompt (vision-enabled prompt builder with Qwen2-VL), WAN Prompt Splitter (cinematic styling), Ollama Prompt Chat (LLM enhancement), LoRA Loader with CivitAI trigger fetching, Dual CLIP Loader (Flux/SD3/SDXL), smart KSampler (AMP handling for WAN/Flow/FP8), Empty Latent with aspect presets, Upscale & Tile Calculator for Ultimate SD Upscale, Resolution Helper, Image Processor, WAN Helper, and more.

custom_nodes.author: 18yz153
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Persona-Director
custom_nodes.description: A visual state machine for consistent character generation. It intelligently maintains character identity, outfits, and locations across multiple generations using LLM-driven state management.

custom_nodes.author: bulldog68
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_FMJ_SaveImageVersions
custom_nodes.description: Image saving with complete metadata (prompts, seed, software versions) + smart loading.

custom_nodes.author: GonDesign
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-HaoranWanxImageEdit
custom_nodes.description: API plugin for Alibaba Cloud Wanx 2.1 Image Editing model. Supports 10 functions including stylization, inpainting, and outpainting.

custom_nodes.author: BWDrum
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Random Wildcard Loader
custom_nodes.description: A custom node for randomized prompt generation with __wildcard__ expansion, subfolder filtering, prefix/suffix support, and seed-based reproducibility.

custom_nodes.author: solidlime
custom_nodes.title: Random Image Picker
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI custom node for flexible image loading with file picker and random folder selection. Features instant preview, auto mode switching, and browser-based file selection.

custom_nodes.author: mengqin
custom_nodes.title: Twinflow Node for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: This is a set of sampling nodes specifically designed for fine-tuning Twinflow models.

custom_nodes.author: shmbatom
custom_nodes.title: Comfyui-ImageAB-Compare
custom_nodes.description: image split comparison horizontally/vertically, real-time mouse interaction to adjust split ratios, bidirectional linkage between slider and mouse, and the ability to export comparison images with precise split lines.

custom_nodes.author: DanrisiUA

custom_nodes.description: Custom nodes for combining multiple LoRAs without overexposure on distilled models like Z-Image Turbo

custom_nodes.author: MechaBabyAi

custom_nodes.description: Enhance ComfyUI workflow by providing powerful node search, attribute search, and port navigation features with Ctrl+F shortcut support.

custom_nodes.author: yangrui511
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Text-Preserve
custom_nodes.description: Custom node providing text preservation preprocessing for ComfyUI using OCR to identify text regions and apply blur/noise fusion to non-text areas. (Description by CC)

custom_nodes.author: Atsushi888

custom_nodes.author: yohji-yohji

custom_nodes.author: ZUENS2020

custom_nodes.description: LLM integration nodes for ComfyUI. Support chat completions and image generation with OpenAI/Gemini. Features precise resolution and aspect ratio control for Gemini image generation (1K/2K/4K with 5 aspect ratios). Zero external dependencies.
